Make a payment
--------------

You can now pay your utility bills, traffic citations and permits online. Click on the link below to access your account:

[Pay your bill online](https://www.fastgovpay.com/ballinger)

NIXLE ALERT

To quickly opt-in for text messagesText COBTX to 888777

You can also text Zip Code “76821” for more options

To register onlineGo to nixle.com

Click “Sign Up” Enter your information in the spaces provided

Enter an email address and cell phone number where you would like to receive messages

Click “I Accept. Sign me up!” Enter your home address to receive local messages
